review_blob: Clear golden color. Light hop and malt aromas. Some citrus and grass smells. Medium carbonation. Not much of a front taste somewhat flat mouth feel. but the back taste is smooth with floral and citrus notes. Overall this is probably more of a pale ale but its a decent beer.
beer_name: Widmer Brothers Rotator IPA Series - Hopside Down IPL (India Pale Lager)
